remarks: Value of the projective subspace polarity function.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
polfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
polfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
polfval.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
polfval.p $e |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
polvalN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ X C_ A ) -> ( P ` X ) = ( A i^i |^|_ p e. X ( M ` ( ._|_ ` p ) ) ) ) $.
$d K p $.
$d X p $.
